subject: Self Care
title: Phone-Free Zones
description: A micro-lesson that makes Phone-Free Zones usable.

hook.text: Phones at the dinner table reduce conversation quality â€” even when nobody touches them. Their presence alone distracts.

buildup.text: Research shows that a visible phone reduces cognitive capacity. Your brain spends energy resisting the temptation to check.

discovery.text: Phone-free zones â€” bedroom, dining table, bathroom â€” create spaces where presence and connection are uninterrupted.

twist.text: Even face-down, the phone drains attention. In another room is the only truly effective placement for deep presence.

climax.text: Designate three phone-free zones in your life starting today. The bedroom is the most impactful place to begin.

punchline.text: Phone in another room. Presence in this one. Choose wisely.

quiz.question: How does a visible phone affect cognitive capacity?
options: It reduces cognitive capacity because the brain resists the temptation to check
